input_email_body:
Subject: Medical Security Procedures

Dear Customer Support, I am inquiring about the recommended security protocols for the protection of medical data as used by hospital IT systems. I am interested in knowing what measures can be taken to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of patient data You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Are there specific guidelines or regulations that must be followed? I appreciate your time and look forward to your response My name is Carlos Mendoza.. Thank you for your assistance in this matter.
